comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Well, Dan Maes was certainly right; after putting something socialist between my legs for a bit today, I came back to the office feeling godless and surly. And I had an overwhelming urge to get an abortion and enter the three-legged race at the Friends of the Rainforest picnic down by Boulder Creek. I think the Surgeon General should require that a warning decal be prominently displayed on all new bicycles stating something about creeping liberal tendencies, precious bodily fluids, and chronic bed-wetting. These machines are clearly the devil's flytrap. Thank goodness for watchdogs like Dan. Let's just hope his leash holds until we get across the state line. DU
